results.title: Statins Inhibit Inflammatory Cytokine Production by Macrophages and Acinar-to-Ductal Metaplasia of Pancreatic Cells
results.text_hl: ...Acinar@<m>DISEASE_Carcinoma_Ductal</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D044584 @@@-to-ductal metaplasia@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Carcinoma_Ductal</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D044584 @@@ADM@@@) in the pancreas is often seen as a response to @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@pancreatic inflammation@@@, for example, during @DISEASE_Pancreatitis @DISEASE_MESH:D010195 @@@pancreatitis@@@, but is usually reversible once the triggering stressor subsides.

citations.NLM: Ako S, Teper Y, Ye L, Sinnett-Smith J, Hines OJ, Rozengurt E, Eibl G. Statins Inhibit Inflammatory Cytokine Production by Macrophages and Acinar-to-Ductal Metaplasia of Pancreatic Cells Gastro Hep Adv. 2022;1(4):640-651. PMID: 36313271
